attributes.action: stop accepting asylum applications from East Africans
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK should stop accepting asylum applications from anyone from Somalia, Eritrea and elsewhere in the region.  The hospitality of the UK has been widely abused from people from these countries with numerous serious crimes, not just the 21st of July attempted bombings, being committed. It has to stop.  Asylum applications should no longer be accepted, and "indefinite leave to remain" should no longer be granted.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
